Text.text: Which of these is not offered on campus?
A Writing Center
Incorrect, a Writing Center IS available on campus!
Group tutoring
Incorrect, group tutoring IS available on campus!
Individual tutoring
Incorrect, individual tutoring IS available on campus!
All of the above resources are offered on campus
Correct! A Writing Center, group tutoring, and individual tutoring are all available on campus!
Which of the following statements is false?
The Physics Help Center is for Physics majors only
Correct! The Physics Help Center is available to any student enrolled in a physics course.
You may only schedule two appointments at the University Writing Center per week
Incorrect: it IS true that each student is allowed to schedule up to two appointments at the University Writing Center per week.
There is a separate writing assistance program for multilingual students
Incorrect: a specialized writing assistance program IS available specifically for multilingual students!
The Math Tutorial Lab accepts walk-ins
Incorrect, walk-ins ARE accepted at The Math Tutorial Lab!
Which is not a place where you can obtain a list of tutors for a particular subject?
The office of the department for the class you need help in
Incorrect. In many department offices, there is a list of tutors for each subject in that department.
The Office of Academic Enrichment
Incorrect. The Office of Academic Enrichment has a list of tutors for each subject, as well as information on group tutoring.
Your advisorâ€™s office
Correct. Your advisor can only direct you to the tutoring services available on campus.
ISE Lab Learning Community Center
Incorrect. There are drop-in tutoring sessions available in the ISE Lab.
If you need assistance writing a paper, where should you go?
Your advisor's office
Incorrect: your advisor is not trained to help you improve your writing skills.
The Office of Academic Enrichment
Incorrect. The Office of Academic Enrichment provides tutoring services, but not writing assistance.
The Writing Center
Correct! The Writing Center provides assistance with writing papers.
All of the above
Incorrect: two of these resources are not designed for writing assistance.
Which of the following resources is NOT free for all students?
The Writing Center
Incorrect. The Writing Center IS free for all students!
Individual tutoring
Correct: you must pay for an individual tutor unless you get free tutoring through a special program.
The Physics Help Center
Incorrect: the Physics Help Center IS free for all students!
The Math Tutorial Lab
Incorrect: the Math Tutorial Lab IS free for all students!
Which of these topics does the Office of Academic Enrichment provide an online workshop for?
Time management
Incorrect: the Office of Academic Enrichment provides workshops for all of these topics!
Help declaring a major
Incorrect: the Office of Academic Enrichment provides workshops for all of these topics!
Goal setting
Incorrect: the Office of Academic Enrichment provides workshops for all of these topics!
All of the above
Correct! The Office of Academic Enrichment provides Online Workshops to help you with time management, studying strategies, test-taking, and goal setting
